original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘issāsassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena issāsassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, issāso sare pātayanto ubho pāde pathaviyaṁ daḷhaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti,
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja issāsaḥ sare pātayantaḥ ubho pāde pathaviyam daḷham patiṭṭhāpeti

original: jaṇṇuavekallaṁ karoti, sarakalāpaṁ kaṭisandhimhi ṭhapeti, kāyaṁ upatthaddhaṁ karoti,
analyzed: karoti sara kalāpam kaṭi sandhimhi ṭhapeti kāyam upatthaddham karoti

original: dve hatthe sandhiṭṭhānaṁ āropeti, muṭṭhiṁ pīḷayati, aṅguliyo nirantaraṁ karoti, gīvaṁ
analyzed: dve hatthe sandhiṭṭhānam āropeti muṭṭhim pīḍayati aṅguliyaḥ nirantaram karoti

original: paggaṇhāti, cakkhūni mukhañca pidahati, nimittaṁ ujuṁ karoti, hāsamuppādeti ‘vijjhissāmī’ti;
analyzed: paggaṇhāti cakkhūni mukham ca pidahati nimittam ujum karoti hāsam uppādeti vijjhissāmi iti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlapathaviyaṁ vīriyapāde patiṭṭhāpetabbaṁ,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sīla pathaviyam vīriya pāde patiṭṭhāpetabba

original: khantisoraccaṁ avekallaṁ kātabbaṁ, saṁvare cittaṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ, saṁyamaniyame attā
analyzed: khanti soraccam avekallam kātabba savare cittam ṭhapetabba sayama niyame attā

original: upanetabbo, icchā mucchā pīḷayitabbā, yoniso manasikāre cittaṁ nirantaraṁ kātabbaṁ,
analyzed: upanetabbaḥ icchā mucchā pīḍayitabbā yonisaḥ manasikāre cittam nirantaram kātabba

original: vīriyaṁ paggahetabbaṁ, cha dvārā pidahitabbā, sati upaṭṭhapetabbā, hāsamuppādetabbaṁ
analyzed: vīriyam dvārā pidahitabbā sati upaṭṭhapetabbā hāsamuppādetabba
sabba kilese ñāṇa nārācena vijjhissāmi iti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, issāsassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja issāsassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, issāso āḷakaṁ pariharati vaṅkajimhakuṭilanārācassa ujukaraṇāya;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja issāsaḥ āḷakam pariharati vaṅka jimha kuṭila nārācassa uju karaṇāya

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṁ kāye satipaṭṭhānaāḷakaṁ pariharitabbaṁ vaṅkajimhakuṭilacittassa ujukaraṇāya.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena imasmin kāye sati paṭṭhāna āḷakam pariharitabbam vaṅka jimha kuṭila cittassa uju karaṇāya

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, issāsassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja issāsassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, issāso lakkhe upāseti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja issāsaḥ lakkhe upāseti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṁ kāye upāsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena imasmin kāye

original: Kathaṁ, mahārāja yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṁ kāye upāsitabbaṁ?
analyzed: katha mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena imasmin kāye

original: Aniccato upāsitabbaṁ, dukkhato upāsitabbaṁ, anattato upāsitabbaṁ, rogato …pe…
analyzed: aniccataḥ upāsitabba dukkhataḥ upāsitabba anattataḥ upāsitabba rogataḥ pe

original: evaṁ kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imasmiṁ kāye upāsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena imasmin kāye

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, issāsassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja issāsassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, issāso sāyaṁ pātaṁ upāsati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja issāsaḥ sāyam pātam upāsati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sāyaṁ pātaṁ ārammaṇe upāsitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sāyam pātam ārammaṇe

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, issāsassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja issāsassa catuttham aṅgam
mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā
